Ability.Name: --InitializePvE--
Ability.Lua:
if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_failroad.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put PQR_failroad.lua in the data folder.", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end end
--FixLag local ping = tonumber((select(3,GetNetStats()) + select(4,GetNetStats())) / 2000) + .025
if ping < .05 then ping = .05 elseif ping > .3 then ping = .3 end PQR_SpellAvailableTime = ping
--FixStance(Based on Spec) --Arms if GetSpecialization() == 1 then if GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end
if IsEquippedItemType("shields") then if UseEquipmentSet("2HSet") then return true end end end
--Fury if GetSpecialization() == 2 then if GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end
if IsEquippedItemType("shields") then if UseEquipmentSet("FurySet") then return true end end end
--Prot if GetSpecialization() == 3 then if GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 2 then CastShapeshiftForm(2) end
if not IsEquippedItemType("shields") then if UseEquipmentSet("ShieldSet") then return true end end end
--Define Custom Targets if not custTars then custTars = {"target","focus","arena1","arena2","arena3","arena4","arena5"} end
--HotKeys(PvE)
if IsRightAltKeyDown() then return true end

Ability.Name: --InitializePvP--
Ability.Lua:
if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_failroad.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put PQR_failroad.lua in the data folder.", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end end
--FixLag local ping = tonumber((select(3,GetNetStats()) + select(4,GetNetStats())) / 2000) + .025
if ping < .05 then ping = .05 elseif ping > .3 then ping = .3 end PQR_SpellAvailableTime = ping
--FixStance(Based on Spec) --Arms if GetSpecialization() == 1 then if not inCombat() and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) elseif inCombat() and not inCombatAndMelee() and getHp("player") <= 85 and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 2 then CastShapeshiftForm(2) elseif inCombatAndMelee() and getHp("player") < 35 and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 2 then CastShapeshiftForm(2) elseif inCombat and getHp("player") > 85 and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end end
--Fury if GetSpecialization() == 2 then if not inCombat() and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) elseif inCombat() and getHp("player") <= 85 and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 2 then CastShapeshiftForm(2) elseif inCombat() and getHp("player") > 85 and GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end end
--Prot if GetSpecialization() == 3 then if GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 2 then CastShapeshiftForm(2) end if not IsEquippedItemType("shields") then if UseEquipmentSet("ShieldSet") then return true end end end
--Define Custom Targets if not custTars then custTars = {"target","focus","arena1","arena2","arena3","arena4","arena5"} end
--HotKeys(PvP) if IsRightAltKeyDown() then return true end

Ability.Name: --Interrupts--
Ability.Lua:
local castingTarget = nil
for i=1, #custTars do if not spellReflect(custTars[i]) and ( select(9,UnitCastingInfo(custTars[i]))==false or select(8,UnitChannelInfo(custTars[i]))==false ) then castingTarget = custTars[i] end end
if castingTarget and ( not spellReflect(castingTarget) or GetSpecialization() == 2 ) and not UnitBuffID("player",23920) then local castName = UnitCastingInfo(castingTarget) local channelName = UnitChannelInfo(castingTarget) local castName = channelName --Pum-- if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6552)) == 0 and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(6552),castingTarget) == 1 and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(castName) or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(6552),castingTarget) PQR_DelayRotation(.5) end --DS-- if ( select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6552)) ~= 0 or IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(6552),castingTarget) == 0 ) and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(102060)) == 0 and CheckInteractDistance(castingTarget,3) and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(castName) or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(102060),castingTarget) PQR_DelayRotation(.5) end --HT-- if ( select(2,GetSpellCooldown(6552)) ~= 0 or IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(6552),castingTarget) == 0 ) and ( select(2,GetSpellCooldown(102060)) ~= 0 or not CheckInteractDistance(castingTarget,3) ) and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(57755)) == 0 and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(57755),castingTarget) == 1 and ( PQR_IsOnInterruptList(castName) or PQR_IsInterruptAll() ) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(57755),castingTarget) end end

Ability.Name: Arms_PvPAdditions
Ability.Lua:
--vars local shieldWall = false local sRcheck = false local useDisarm = false local shouldSlow = true
if inCombat() and getHp("player") <= 30 then _castSpell(97462) end
for i=1, #custTars do if spellReflect(custTars[i]) == 1 then sRcheck = true end end
if inCombat() and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(871))==0 and getHp("player") <= 35 then shieldWall = true end
if sRcheck == true and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(23920))==0 and not UnitBuffID("player",23920) then if UseEquipmentSet("ShieldSet") then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(23920),nil) return true end end
if shieldWall == true and not UnitBuffID("player",871) then if UseEquipmentSet("ShieldSet") then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(871),nil) return true end end
if ( sRcheck == false or shieldWall == false ) and IsEquippedItemType("shields") and not UnitBuffID("player",23920) and not UnitBuffID("player",871) then if UseEquipmentSet("2HSet") then return true end end
if inCombat() and getHp("player") <= 50 then _castSpell(118038,"player") end
for i=1, #custTars do if inCombat() and isImmune(custTars[i]) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(57755),custTars[i]) == 1 and UnitExists(custTars[i]) and PQR_IsMoving() == false then PQR_CustomTarget = custTars[i] _castSpell(64382,PQR_CustomTarget) end end
for i=1, #custTars do if inCombat() and shouldDisarm(custTars[i]) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(676),custTars[i]) == 1 then PQR_CustomTarget = custTars[i] useDisarm = true end end
if useDisarm == true and not UnitBuffID("target",110700) then _castSpell(676,PQR_CustomTarget) end
if inMelee() and ( isSlowed("target") or immuneToSlow("target") ) then shouldSlow = false end
if shouldSlow == false and UnitDebuffID("target",1715) then local hasHamstring, _, _, _, _, _, HendTimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1715) if hasHamstring then if HendTimer - GetTime() < 1 then return true end end end
if inMelee() and shouldSlow == true then _castSpell(1715) end
if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(114192)) == 0 and IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(114192)) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end _castSpell(114192) end
if select(2,GetTotemInfo(1)) and ( IsLeftShiftKeyDown() or IsLeftAltKeyDown() ) then TargetUnit(select(2,GetTotemInfo(1))) _castSpell(3411,"target") end
